output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF 11240014 is present, indicating this is electoral material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Directly mentions George Simion (presidential candidate) - Also promotes Ioan Marcu for Parliament - Clear call to vote for "George Simion - poziția 2 la prezidențiale"
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - Paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Uses public messaging format
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Direct call to vote ("Votează George Simion") - Promotes specific ballot positions - Links to campaign websites (planulsimion.ro, programaur.ro) - Uses campaign slogans and hashtags
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content - Contains explicit voting instructions and campaign messaging
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a structured campaign message - Contains official campaign elements (CMF number, website links) - Paid promotional content
This is clearly electoral propaganda that continues after the presidential campaign period has ended, specifically promoting George Simion for president.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Direct call to vote for presidential candidate - Paid distribution - Campaign messaging - Official campaign materials and links
conclusion.message-for-police: Dan Cosma și AUR, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material electoral plătit (ID Facebook: 1262654651439486) ce conține îndemnuri directe de vot pentru candidatul la președinție George Simion ("Votează George Simion - poziția 2 la prezidențiale"), după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală prezidențială. Materialul este difuzat după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, include număr CMF (11240014), și reprezintă propagandă electorală conform Art. 36(7) din Legea 334/2006, având obiectiv electoral explicit și adresându-se publicului larg prin platformele Facebook și Instagram.
